docs.title: DEEPS Documentation
docs.text:
Welcome to the Departmental Exam Processing System documentation.

DEEPS is a comprehensive academic data management system designed for educational institutions.

docs.title: Features
docs.text:
• Student record management
  • Assessment processing
  • Report generation
  • Local data security

docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text: This documentation will help you install, configure, and use DEEPS effectively.
